biotools.summary: Genomic data analysis tool designed to perform a functional analysis of gene expression data obtained from cDNA microarray experiments. Besides automated functional annotation of gene expression data, functional analysis allows to detect co-regulated biological processes (i.e. represented by annotating genomic themes) through a specifically designed co-clustering procedure involving biological annotations and gene expression data.

bioschemas.name: FunCluster
